name: Theren Oakwhisper
title: Entertainment Selector
description: A tall elf with an air of ancient wisdom and refined taste. He judges musicians not by volume, but by their ability to create harmony with the forest's natural rhythms.

greeting.first_time: Greetings. I am Theren. I select musicians whose art honors the peace of this place. Do you perform?
greeting.returning: Your music was welcome before. Will you grace us again?
greeting.already_performed: The forest appreciates variety. Return tomorrow for another performance.

ask_about_performing.text: We seek musicians who understand subtlety and grace. Instruments that complement nature's voice, not overpower it. Your charisma—your ability to connect with the audience—greatly influences your compensation.

ask_about_rates.text:
Our preferences reflect our values:

Lyre: 16 gold - traditional elvish
Flute: 15 gold - like birdsong
Pan Flute: 14 gold - nature's breath
Lute: 13 gold
Viol: 12 gold

We do not book horns, drums, bagpipes, or shawms. Such instruments disturb the tranquility we cultivate. Plus charisma bonus.

book_performance.failure_no_instrument: You must possess an instrument before you may perform.
book_performance.failure_already_performed: You have performed today. The forest invites you to return tomorrow.

goodbye.text: Walk in harmony with the woods.
